thread.title: BRIEF-Cardiovascular Systems Says OrbusNeich 1.0mm Sapphire II PRO Coronary Balloon Granted FDA Clearance

title: BRIEF-Cardiovascular Systems Says OrbusNeich 1.0mm Sapphire II PRO Coronary Balloon Granted FDA Clearance
text: March 1, 2018 / 7:39 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Cardiovascular Systems Says OrbusNeich 1.0mm Sapphire II PRO Coronary Balloon Granted FDA Clearance Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 1 (Reuters) - Cardiovascular Systems Inc: * CARDIOVASCULAR SYSTEMS, INC. AND ORBUSNEICH ANNOUNCE FDA CLEARANCE OF THE FIRST AND ONLY 1.0MM CORONARY BALLOON IN THE U.S. * CARDIOVASCULAR SYSTEMS INC - ANTICIPATES THAT ORBUSNEICHâ€˜S FULL BALLOON PRODUCT PORTFOLIO WILL BECOME AVAILABLE IN U.S. THROUGHOUT 2018 AND 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
